hc.core.util

Interface IEncrypter


  • public interface IEncrypter
    It is not required to implement this interface to enhance the encryption.
    Powerful and efficient encryption system is built in HomeCenter system.

    How to develop a encryptor, please see http://homecenter.mobi/en/pc/faq.htm#item7

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void decryptCertKey(byte[] data, int offset, int len)
      Note: Process data ONLY inside [offset, offset + len - 1].

      Note: Process data ONLY inside [offset, offset + len - 1].
      void initEncrypter(boolean isMobileSide)
      system will call initEncrypter method before encrypt or decrypt; System will call setUUID and setPassword before initEncrypter method.
      void notifyExit(boolean isMobileSide)
      When mobile or PC exit, It will be called.
      void setPassword(byte[] password) 
      void setUUID(byte[] uuid)
